EmailTemplate.subject: Gartner & Forrester Reports: Taking Advantage Of The Cloud
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
As organisations adopt cloud applications, platforms and services to help drive their digital transformation initiatives, they are faced with a number of challenges including implementing hybrid cloud strategies, dealing with talent shortages and modernising legacy applications.
To help you manage these challenges access the following reports:
Gartner: Top Challenges Facing I&O Leaders in 2018 & What to Do About It: https://www.gartner.com/doc/reprints?id=1-4TLDXNQ&ct=180321&st=sb In this report Gartner outlines the key recommendations to help infrastructure and operations professionals effectively support their organisations' digital business initiatives.
Forrester Predictions 2018: Cloud Computing Accelerates Enterprise Transformation Everywhere: https://reprints.forrester.com/#/assets/2/995/RES139611/reports In this report Forrester outlines the 10 key factors that will shape the cloud computing landscape in 2018 and advises infrastructure and operations leaders on how to respond.
I trust these analyst reports will help you make transformation real for your organisation.
Regards,
Lionel Lim Vice President and Managing Director, Asia Pacific & Japan Pivotal
